data.name: Escape from the Cosmic Abyss Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Anything from 2008 or newer should run it.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Should run on any graphics card with Opengl 3 support
  • Storage: 283 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 or newer or similar.
  • Processor: Anything from 2008 or newer should run it.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Should run on any graphics card with Opengl 3 support
  • Storage: 290 MB available space
